I have gone through many things before i got this to work. I'll tell you how:

If you get the ''mini-dump'' error, use this link and install the directx: http://www.softpedia.com/get/System/OS-Enhancements/DirectX-9.0c-Redistributable.shtml

If you get stuck on the level 3, do this:
1. Go to the installation folder (C:>program files>super meat boy)
2. Delete the UserData folder
3. Start the game exe.
4. Shut down the game
5. If you'll get some new stuff into the installation folder, that's good. (they should be like [your user name]-swarm folder and ''playername'' text file.)
6. Make a new folder called UserData.
7. Move the new stuff into that folder.

After that you shouldn't freeze on level 3. Your progress and setting will be saved too.

I hope I helped some people here :) I try to solve more stuff if there seems to be.

Urgh so damn frustrating. 

Anyway as far as installing goes, run the original install as !administrator! and then once it installs also go to properties and force the game exe to always run as admin.

If you don't run the game as admin and you've installed to program files or any other folder that requires admin rights to write then you'll get an error since the game won't be allowed to save to that directory.
